directions: Press tofu to remove excess water:  Place tofu on a flat surface.  Cover with a cutting board, and place an iron skillet or a similarly heavy object on top.  Allow it to sit for about 30 minutes.
Crumble tofu into a medium bowl.  Mix in miso and tahini.  If desired, stir in onion, carrot, and seeds. Refrigerate.
title: Savory TMT Sandwich Filling
